metadata.title: CVE-2016-1504 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: dhcpcd before 6.10.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(invalid read and crash) via vectors related to the option length.

criterions.comment: dhcpcd5 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
dhcpcd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
